summary:
Hello everyone and welcome to my first mod :D! Anyway to get this item you will need 3 troll fat and 1 steel sword. Get that and go to a forge and it should be under steel! Oh yeah this is basically a sword that does a ton of damage and is super fast.

Thanks to all who download and like this mod! Also this is NOT lore frien
descriptionHtml:
Hello everyone and welcome to my first mod :D! Anyway to get this item you will need 3 troll fat and 1 steel sword. Get that and go to a forge and it should be under steel! Oh yeah this is basically a sword that does a ton of damage and is super fast.Thanks to all who download and like this mod! Also this is NOT lore friendly in anyway and is mainly a cheat mod.



Also if you want to download the steam version here is the link:http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=324396548&searchtext=Sword+of+Trolling
author: skyrimfan20
